column3: How do we test this change?\n

There's a testcase in the unit tests that ensures that a '' CHECKSIG NOT is considered a valid transaction. The CPubKey.IsValid() function just tests size() > 0 after all, and size() returns an unsigned char.\n\nWhich is where things get interesting: CPubKey.size() is a new thing from Pieter when he created the CPubKey class; the previous code in checksig tested vchSig.empty().
